name: Pinecone Bomb
text: Created by Ghorus when he was working to create the ghorans, pinecone bomb infuses a small pinecone with power, causing it to detonate with explosive force when thrown. You throw the pinecone at a target or point within range and it detonates immediately upon landing, dealing 1d6 points of piercing damage per 2 caster levels you have (maximum 5d6) to each creature caught in the spread.
components_zh: 言语，姿势，材料（一颗松果）
text_zh: 松果炸弹法术是戈罗斯（ghorus）在制作蒿兰人（ghorans）时创造的，它会向一个小松果中注入能量，使其在投掷时产生爆炸。你将松果扔向距离内的一个目标或地点，它会在降落时立即爆炸，对爆炸扩散范围内的每一个生物都造成1d6点/2等级的穿刺伤害（最多5d6）。
